EmailTemplate.name: 12/12/2012 Last Day Term 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Last Day Term 1
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Part of The British Schools Group
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Just a gentle reminder that school finishes this Friday 14th December at 11.30am. For those parents whose children take the school bus, the revision times will be emailed out to you today. We would like to wish you all a very Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year and look forward to seeing you back in term 2!
Regards,
Administration Team The British International School of Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Beijing - Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Guangzhou - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona - Marbella
